articles.title: India’s Pandya, Rahul to lead new teams, IPL to begin in March - DAWN.com
articles.description: A total of 1,214 players, including 318 overseas cricketers from 18 countries, have signed up for the IPL auction.
articles.content:
All-rounder Hardik Pandya will lead Ahmedabad and batsman KL Rahul will captain Lucknow when the franchises make their debuts in the Indian Premier League (IPL) in March.
